text: Marlon Bundo (2012/2013 - , 2022), also known as Bunny of the United States (BOTUS), was a rabbit belonging to the family of Mike Pence, the 48th Vice President of the United States. He was the first rabbit to travel on Air Force Two, has a popular Instagram account, and is the subject of two children's books. He was born in Chicago and named after Marlon Brando. In 2013, the Pence family bought the rabbit from Craigslist for their daughter Charlotte. Marlon Bundo's death was announced on social media by Charlotte on January 15, 2022. ==References== Category:Individual animals Category:2010s births Category:2022 deaths
title: Marlon Bundo
